items.sentence: I don't think it's going to be difficult to find Tom.
In a few minutes, I have a meeting with the director.
Things didn't happen quite the way Tom said they did.
I don't think that Tom wants to do that this morning.
I don't think that I'd be able to get Tom to do that.
No one will likely even notice that you aren't there.
Tom didn't know how to do that until he was thirteen.
His favourite team doesn't win a lot of competitions.
Tom and Mary were able to eat as much as they wanted.
You should stay after the party and help us clean up.
